channel.title: Pictures of Rare Drops
channel.description:
If you have any pictures of rare drops from boss monsters, post them here.
About 10 minutes ago:
[img]http://i119.photobucket.com/albums/o129/daggerheart8/FIRSTDCLAWSPLITedit-1.jpg[/img]
It was my first dragon claw split, 2nd duo with the friend. I did about 40+ solo kills before that. It was funny because he had typed claws!@#!@#!@# and yelled it on Skype before the demon died, and then we got the split.

item.title: Pictures of Rare Drops
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:2644, topic:311337”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=407777.msg4447482#msg4447482 date=1409606866]

First ever KBD kill on that account

Okay, what’s so good about the rhinos? Everybody has one. (Except for me because I can’t be bothered to do the quest)

Carries items similar to the value a yak can have & 10% bxp. You can no longer get one.

Oh, well I just renewed my membership a few days ago and was told it was something to do with a quest, guess I missed out.

It wasn’t a quest. You just had to answer some question every day and you got it. It gave Bonus XP

My friend isn’t that credible I guess lol

On topic:

Whoooo I can’t believe I got this haha. So glad I raged through and finished Elemental Workshop III for those keys lol, that quest blew but it paid off.

Funnily enough I got one today too (I didn’t screenshot it though but you can see me cashing it and saying in the clan).

[/quote]wait with that item could I use like, say, an Arma staff and it becomes 500 arma staffs?

Yeah that would be nice lol. It’s good for taking long trips, those go for iirc around 3k each on the GE, so that’s like, what 1.5m? IMO he should keep it and use it, as you can use it to create a bigger profit. Kind of off topic I recently got a lucky (forgot) and made 5m of that… I’m superstitious about the chests now and always pick the top right one, no matter what. It’s gotten me 12.5m so far so I’m gonna keep with it lol[/quote]
I have a pak yak so I don’t use them. I keep 100 in my bank just in case though. I cashed them in for 800k so 7.3m from 2 spins, not bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Pictures of Rare Drops
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

ox random xi:

wait then the item description doesn’t make sense. what is it actually useful for then

When you use the magic notepaper on another item it becomes a stackable bank note. So theoretically, (if one could last that long), you could kill and collect 528 (+ possible BoB) frost dragon bones on one single trip. Can be quite profitable if used correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Pictures of Rare Drops
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:2642, topic:311337”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=407777.msg4447451#msg4447451 date=1409592463]

First ever KBD kill on that account

Okay, what’s so good about the rhinos? Everybody has one. (Except for me because I can’t be bothered to do the quest)

Carries items similar to the value a yak can have & 10% bxp. You can no longer get one.

Oh, well I just renewed my membership a few days ago and was told it was something to do with a quest, guess I missed out.

It wasn’t a quest. You just had to answer some question every day and you got it. It gave Bonus XP

My friend isn’t that credible I guess lol

On topic:

Whoooo I can’t believe I got this haha. So glad I raged through and finished Elemental Workshop III for those keys lol, that quest blew but it paid off.

Funnily enough I got one today too (I didn’t screenshot it though but you can see me cashing it and saying in the clan).

[/quote]wait with that item could I use like, say, an Arma staff and it becomes 500 arma staffs?[/quote]
Yeah that would be nice lol. It’s good for taking long trips, those go for iirc around 3k each on the GE, so that’s like, what 1.5m? IMO he should keep it and use it, as you can use it to create a bigger profit. Kind of off topic I recently got a lucky (forgot) and made 5m of that… I’m superstitious about the chests now and always pick the top right one, no matter what. It’s gotten me 12.5m so far so I’m gonna keep with it lol

Read full topic

item.title: Pictures of Rare Drops
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:2639, topic:311337”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=407777.msg4442554#msg4442554 date=1407281475]

First ever KBD kill on that account

Okay, what’s so good about the rhinos? Everybody has one. (Except for me because I can’t be bothered to do the quest)

Carries items similar to the value a yak can have & 10% bxp. You can no longer get one.

Oh, well I just renewed my membership a few days ago and was told it was something to do with a quest, guess I missed out.

It wasn’t a quest. You just had to answer some question every day and you got it. It gave Bonus XP

My friend isn’t that credible I guess lol

On topic:

Whoooo I can’t believe I got this haha. So glad I raged through and finished Elemental Workshop III for those keys lol, that quest blew but it paid off.
[/quote]with those lucky items, is it better to just cash out?[/quote]
I did for two main reasons. One, the lucky armor’s color is different from it’s actual counter-part, so you look like a dumbass wearing it with the real stuff. Second, I don’t use mage enough to even care about it lol. I cashed it out and am currently in the process of burning it all on construction.

Read full topic

item.title: Pictures of Rare Drops
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:2626, topic:311337”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=407777.msg4417543#msg4417543 date=1396659260]
RuneScape looks extremely more ‘complicated’ than before, a very messy screen, just as if I was on WoW with all my hotbars full on all sides.
[/quote]

It’s not complicated at all. It’s very easy to use and to get used to.[/quote]I doubt it’s actually hard, just as I said I’ve played WoW before with every hotbar filled with abilities, but as someone said before me RuneScape used to be a click and kill based game with 1 interface open that wasn’t changeable, now I’m seeing about 4-5 interfaces on the screen with lots of buttons and flashy colors.

Read full topic
